column5: anybudy know how good the walleye/pike fishing is on the spanish river or surrounding area mid may???
Its pretty good depending on how early the spring is. I'm heading up next weekend for the 4th year in a row now.
Where do you launch in that neck of the woods?

I was slightly more north of there and it was the greatest fishing I've ever had. There are tons of smaller lakes in the area which seem to be only accessible by canoe, but there are big lakes too. The smallmouth were hitting a worm under the float like crazy.
